name: Portu-Geese
description:
Portu-Geese is a 2d flappy bird inspired game where you are a goose gliding to avoid the pipes, the game gets infected by a glitch however and you need to save it.

This game is unfinished and will not get updates for a while, so don't look here for a couple years.

V.0.9

More Info: https://discord.gg/yXXY2XXb
